ActNuclear Safety and Control Act
PrecisAppointment of ALEXANDER (SANDY) McEWAN of Edmonton, Alberta, to be a permanent member of the Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, on a part-time basis.
